Description_lang: Deals increasing Shadow damage over time to the nearest target.  While a target is being Tormented, single-target direct heals received will grant the healer one charge of Vital Spark for each three applications of Torment.
AuraDescription_lang: Suffering increasing Shadow damage over time.Receiving single-target direct heals will grant the healer one charge of Vital Spark for each three applications of Torment.
